description:
Loaded with the bright heat of ginger and umami of savoury soy sauce, this beef fried rice brings dish is a real treat after a day of energy bars and trail-mix.

  • Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add
  • Ingredients: precooked rice, cooked beef (beef, salt), dried whole egg product (whole egg, corn starch, salt, citric acid, xanthan gum), corn starch, peas, carrots, teriyaki sauce powder (soy sauce [soybeans, wheat, salt], maltodextrin, salt, yeast extract, spices, onion powder, garlic powder), onion, sea salt, natural flavour, dried garlic, soy sauce powder (soy sauce [wheat, soybeans, salt], maltodextrin, salt), ginger and green onion
  • Allergens - contains: eggs, wheat, and soy
  • No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy
  • Meals have a 5-year shelf life
name: AlpineAire Ginger Stir Fried Rice with Beef
